slide.title: History: 1.4.0-1.6.0
slide.blurb: Releases now come together with MongoDB server releases

list.bullet:
May 2013 — 1.4.0 — MongoDB 2.4
SSL support, Jeremy starts helping out

Apr 2014 — 1.5.0 — MongoDB 2.6
SASL support, command cursors

Jan 2015 — 1.6.0 — MongoDB 3.0
Rewritten cursor support, and MONGO_METHOD refactoring
